verbose_text: In order to synthesize the MMP-activatable PA imaging nano-probe, the carboxyl groups on the citrate coated CuS nanoparticles (0.8 mg/ml, 200 mul) were firstly activated by N-(3-dimethylaminopropyl - N '-ethylcarbodiimide) hydrochloride (EDC) and N-Hydroxysulfosuccinimide (Sulfo-NHS).
